post:
Cortex Networks is about to take web hosting to a whole new standard. Backed by professionals with over 15 years IT experience you can be rest assured that your site and your data is safe and secure.

All of our servers are heavily monitored around the clock to make sure that they are running efficiently and not overloaded.

New to web hosting? We can help.. If you need help.. Just ask and we will be happy to assist you.


All Accounts Include:

  • Industry Standard SolusVM Control Panel
    Premium Bandwidth
    Full Root Access
    Free VPS monitoring with email alerts (5 minute intervals)
    Free Monthly Offsite VPS Container Backups


All VPS Nodes Feature:

  • Latest Generation Intel E3 Series SandyBridge Processors
    Quad Core Processors /with HyperThreading
    High Speed, Fully Redundant RAID 10 Hard Drive Arrays
